content:
The Ultimate Tropical Poolscape


Immerse yourself in paradise without ever leaving the resort.  The Marker's 3 sparkling pools are designed as private, palm-filled hideaways within a vibrant vacationland.  Relax on chic chaise lounges by sparkling pool waters. Cool off with a dip on a sunny Florida day. Retreat to our tranquil adult-only pool, or simply sip cocktails provided by poolside service that extends well into the evening. The choice is yours - the privacy is unparalleled.
